thread.section_title: Safegenericpharmacy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Safegenericpharmacy | safegenericpharmacy.com
thread.title: Susan Duke

author: Susan Duke
title: Susan Duke
text:
I was very sceptical of ordering careprost from here because it was such a good deal! I have ordered from serval online pharmacies and this was has been the best so far. My order came in 13 days and was the correct order and quantity. Very impressed with all the text up dates and emails. I will order from them again!
Only down fall is that one of the bottles leaked and ruined the box it came in plus 4 other boxes. So I only have 29 bottles instead of 30.
Would recommend to family and friends
